com.mixer.interactive.resources.control

Class ButtonControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mixer.interactive.resources.InteractiveResource<T>
      • com.mixer.interactive.resources.control.InteractiveControl<ButtonControl>
        • com.mixer.interactive.resources.control.ButtonControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInteractiveCreatable, IInteractiveDeletable, IInteractiveUpdatable, Comparable<InteractiveControl>

    public class ButtonControl
extends InteractiveControl<ButtonControl>
    A InteractiveControl represents a button control on the Interactive service.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Microsoft Corporation
